elements.text: It's a cold evening and you have been walking outside without a jacket. After a few minutes, your body starts shaking and you notice that your heart is racing. You feel a little scared thinking about what this could mean, and you decide that your body's response to the cold is...

elements.name: Cold Weather_Physical Health_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
